EmailTemplate.name: Course Cancelation
EmailTemplate.subject: course/class cancellation template w/letterhead
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Due to a scheduling issue, American Student Assistance unfortunately has cancelled the March 13, 2008 Nashville, Tennessee Partnership Dialogue Series.
We would like to thank you for your interest in attending this event and apologize for any inconvenience this cancellation may have caused. We hope to reschedule at later date.
Thanks again for your willingness to take time out of your busy schedule to join us; we look forward to seeing you at future events. If you have any questions, please let me know.
Sincerely, {!Contact.OwnerFullName} {!Contact.OwnerEmail}
